meanings.definition: A claim or right to something
meanings.sent1: I have dibbs on the last cookie.
meanings.sent2: She called dibbs on the front seat in the car.
meanings.sent3: The siblings playfully argued over dibbs on the TV remote.
meanings.sent4: In the game of tag, whoever tags first gets dibbs on being 'it'.
meanings.sent5: He asserted his dibbs on the best spot for watching the fireworks.

meanings.sent1: Can I dibbs this seat next to you?
meanings.sent2: She quickly dibbsed the last slice of pizza.
meanings.sent3: The cat dibbsed the sunny spot by the window before the dog could get there.
meanings.sent4: He dibbsed his favorite toy before his little brother could reach it.
meanings.sent5: The team dibbsed the victory with their outstanding performance.
